mapper.select: SELECT c.camp_no, c.delete_flag, c.camp_reg_date, u.user_id, u.camp_name, u.camp_call, u.addr, c.camp_view_count_current_month, c.camp_reservation_count, c.camp_rating FROM CAMP c, USERS u WHERE c.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY camp_no LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT c.camp_no, c.delete_flag, c.camp_reg_date, u.user_id, u.camp_name, u.camp_call, u.addr, c.camp_view_count_current_month, c.camp_reservation_count, c.camp_rating FROM CAMP c, USERS u WHERE c.user_id = u.user_id ) countTable

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT mainsite_reservation_start, mainsite_reservation_end FROM MAINSITE WHERE camp_no = #{value} AND mainsite_reservation_start >= date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') AND mainsite_reservation_end <= date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') )countTable
